cocktails.name: B-55
cocktails.description: A popular variation of the B-52 shooter.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of Kahlua or another coffee liqueur into a shooter glass.
2. Pour 20ml of Baileys on top of the Kahlua.
3. Very carefully pour 15ml of absinthe on top of the Baileys.

cocktails.name: Baby Guinness
cocktails.description: This layered shooter was named for its appearance — it looks like a tiny glass of stout. The Baileys can also be whipped and spooned on top, for a frothy presentation.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 30ml of coffee liqueur into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 15ml of Irish cream liqueur on top.

cocktails.name: Banshee
cocktails.description: This mild, sweet and creamy shot is named after a female spirit in Irish and Celtic folklore, who foretells the death of a family member of the person who hears her wailing screams. This recipe is for 3 shots.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 50ml of banana liqueur, 50ml of crème de cacao white and 50ml of light cream into a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Shake well and strain into shooter glasses.

cocktails.name: Barracuda
cocktails.description: An IBA official sparkling cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice cubes.
2. Add 45ml of gold rum, 15ml of Galliano, 60ml of pineapple juice and a dash of lime juice.
3. Top with sparkling wine.

cocktails.name: Bee's Knees
cocktails.description: A Prohibition-era mix of gin, lemon, and honey for a bright, silky sour.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, lemon juice, and honey syrup into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Bellini
cocktails.description: Italian sparkling wine mixed with peach purée for a light, fruity spritz.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour peach purée into a chilled champagne flute.
Top with chilled prosecco.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Between the Sheets
cocktails.description: A citrus-forward variation on the Sidecar with cognac, rum, and triple sec.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Serve without garnish.

cocktails.name: Bijou
cocktails.description: First described in Harry Johnson's book 'Bartender's Manual', this herbal cocktail is a classic from the late 1800s. The original recipe had equal parts gin, Chartreuse and vermouth, but it was adapted because many found that the Chartreuse was too dominant.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine 60ml of gin, 30ml of sweet vermouth and 20ml of Chartreuse with ice in a mixing glass.
2. Add a dash of orange bitters, and stir well.
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and, optionally, garnish with a lemon peel.

cocktails.name: Black Russian
cocktails.description: Simple and spirit-forward blend of vodka and coffee liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over the ice.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
cocktails.description: A savory vodka cocktail with tomato juice, spices, and a peppery bite.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir gently.
Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a celery stalk and a lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Blow Job
cocktails.description: A delicious and very popular shooter with controversial references.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of amaretto liqueur into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 20ml of Baileys on top of the amaretto.
3. Top with whipped cream.

cocktails.name: Blue Kamikaze
cocktails.description: The shot variation of the IBA official Kamikaze cocktail. The recipe here is for 3 shots. Blue Kamikaze can also be made as a long drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
2. Add 50ml of vodka, 50ml of blue curaçao and 50ml of lime juice.
3. Shake well and strain into shots.

cocktails.name: BMW
cocktails.description: Baileys, Malibu, Wisky

cocktails.name: Boulevardier
cocktails.description: A whiskey-based Negroni with bourbon, sweet vermouth, and Campari.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Brain Tumor
cocktails.description: This one looks really gross, but you'll like it.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 20ml of peach schnapps into a shooter glass.
Add 20ml of Baileys, and drop some grenadine into the glass.

cocktails.name: Bramble
cocktails.description: A modern gin sour swirled with blackberry liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin and lemon juice into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice.
Pour creme de mure over the top.
Garnish with a lemon slice and two blackberries.

cocktails.name: Brandy Alexander
cocktails.description: A creamy blend of cognac and chocolate liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Sprinkle nutmeg on top.

cocktails.name: Brandy Crusta
cocktails.description: A citrusy brandy cocktail with curaçao, maraschino, and bitters served in a sugar-crusted glass.
cocktails.instructions:
Rim a cocktail glass with sugar.
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into the prepared glass.
Garnish with a long lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Brandy Daisy
cocktails.description: A classic cocktail that dates back to the 19th century.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Pour 60ml of brandy, a few dashes of white rum and orange curaçao.
Add sugar syrup and 15ml of lemon juice.
Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.
Top with a little soda water.

cocktails.name: Brandy Eggnog
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 40ml of brandy, 50ml of milk, 10ml of simple syrup and an egg yolk.
Shake well and strain into a highball glass with ice.
Sprinkle with grated nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Brandy Separator
cocktails.description: A variation of the 'White Russian', this cocktail is close to the 'Sneaky Pete', but smoother. The amount of milk can be varied according to taste.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes.
2. Add 15ml of coffee liqueur, 30ml of brandy and 100ml of milk.
3. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Brave Bull
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes.
Pour 50ml of silver tequila and 30ml of Kahlua.
Stir a little bit to lightly mix the ingredients.

cocktails.name: Breakfast Martini
cocktails.instructions:
Add 50ml of gin, 15ml of triple sec, 15ml of lemon juice and 1 teaspoon of marmalade to a shaker and stir to break up marmalade.
Add ice and shake.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with grated lemon zest.

cocktails.name: Bronx
cocktails.description: A classic gin cocktail with sweet and dry vermouth brightened by orange juice.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Buck cocktails
cocktails.description: Cocktails from the "buck" family use ginger ale or beer and citrus juice with a base liquor.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a collins glass with ice.
Pour 50ml of base liquor over the ice.
Add lime juice, and top with ginger ale or ginger beer.

cocktails.name: Buck's Fizz
cocktails.description: A long drink of orange juice topped with sparkling wine.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 50ml of orange juice into the glass.
Top with 100ml of champagne or dry sparkling wine and stir gently.
Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Bull Shot
cocktails.description: This is a variation of the Bloody Mary that became a popular cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
Put ice cubes into a highball glass.
Add 1 dash of Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco, salt, and pepper.
Pour 30ml of vodka, 60ml of beef bouillon and 10ml of lemon juice over the ice.
Stir gently and garnish with a celery stalk and a lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Bullfrog
cocktails.description: A strong and invigorating cocktail, something you'd want to order in a nightclub.
cocktails.instructions:
Put some ice into a pub glass.
Pour 30ml of white rum, 30ml of vodka, 30ml of tequila, 30ml of blue curaçao and 30ml of gin.
Pour in a full can of Red Bull and stir gently.

cocktails.name: Bushwacker
cocktails.description: A delicious, creamy long cocktail that is very similar to the Piña Colada. The recipe here is for 3 cocktails. A blender should be big enough to fit at least 1 liter of the mixture.
cocktails.instructions:
Put a cup of ice cubes into a blender.
Pour 90ml of dark rum, 90ml of coffee liqueur and 90ml of crème de cacao.
Add 180ml of coconut cream and 180ml of milk.
Blend until smooth and pour into hurricane glasses.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Butter Cream
cocktails.description: A not-so-sweet and very soft, creamy cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes.
Pour 30ml of butterscotch liqueur and 30ml of Baileys Irish Cream.
Add 60ml of milk on top.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Buttery Nipple
cocktails.description: A variation of the "Slippery Nipple" cocktail but with butterscotch instead of Sambuca. This one is even sweeter and softer than the original.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 25ml of butterscotch liqueur into a shooter glass.
Carefully pour 25ml of Baileys on top.
Optionally, add a dash of grenadine syrup.

cocktails.name: Caipirão
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle lime wedges and sugar in a rocks glass.
Fill the glass with crushed ice.
Pour Licor Beirão over the ice.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Caipirinha
cocktails.description: Brazil's national cocktail of muddled lime, sugar, and cachaça served over ice.
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle lime wedges and sugar in a rocks glass.
Fill the glass with crushed ice.
Pour cachaça over the ice.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Caipirissima
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle lime wedges and sugar in a rocks glass.
Fill the glass with crushed ice.
Pour rum over the ice.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Caipiroska
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle lime wedges and sugar in a rocks glass.
Fill the glass with crushed ice.
Pour vodka over the ice.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: California Root Beer
cocktails.description: A fizzy cocktail that mimics the taste of root beer with coffee and vanilla notes.
cocktails.instructions:
Put some ice into a highball glass.
Pour 30ml of coffee liqueur, 30ml of Galliano, 60ml of soda and 30ml of cola.
Top with a splash of beer and stir gently.

cocktails.name: Calypso Coffee
cocktails.description: A rich coffee cocktail with dark rum and Kahlua finished with cream.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Pour 30ml of dark rum and 30ml of Kahlua.
Add 150ml of coffee.
Top with 30ml of double cream.
Garnish with coffee beans.

cocktails.name: Campari Gin Tonic
cocktails.description: A simple classic cocktail, but with the bitterness of Campari and a hint of sweetness.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add 40ml of gin, 20ml of Campari and 100ml of tonic.
Stir gently and garnish with an orange wedge.

cocktails.name: Canary Flip
cocktails.description: A bold combination of wine and egg liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
Combine 60ml of egg liqueur, 60ml of white wine and 20ml of lemon juice in a cocktail shaker with ice.
Shake well and strain into a big chilled Martini glass.
Garnish with lemon zest.

cocktails.name: Canchanchara
cocktails.description: A rustic Cuban mix of honey, lime, and white rum served over ice.
cocktails.instructions:
Combine honey syrup and lime juice in a rocks glass.
Stir to dissolve.
Fill the glass with crushed ice.
Pour white rum over the ice.
Stir briefly.

cocktails.name: Cantaritos
cocktails.description: A refreshing Mexican cocktail traditionally served in a clay pot.
cocktails.instructions:
Prepare the clay pot, if using, by soaking it in cold water for 10–15 minutes.
Put some salt on the rim of the glass and add ice.
Pour 60ml of tequila blanco, 15ml of orange juice, 15ml of lemon juice and 15ml of lime juice into the glass.
Top with 60ml of pink grapefruit soda.
Garnish with pink grapefruit if desired.

cocktails.name: Cape Cod
cocktails.description: A simple mix of vodka and cranberry juice named after the Massachusetts peninsula.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add 40ml of vodka and 120ml of cranberry juice.
Stir well and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Car Crash
cocktails.description: A sweet and fruity long drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Put some ice into a collins glass.
2. Pour 30ml of peach liqueur and 30ml of amaretto.
3. Top with 30ml of lemon juice, 30ml of sugar syrup and 70ml of orange juice.
4. Add a dash of grenadine syrup and stir.

cocktails.name: Cardinale
cocktails.description: A dry, bittersweet Negroni variation with gin, Campari, and dry vermouth.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Casino
cocktails.description: A classic gin sour with maraschino and orange bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Champagne Cocktail
cocktails.description: A celebratory sparkling cocktail with a bitters-soaked sugar cube and a splash of cognac.
cocktails.instructions:
Soak a sugar cube with bitters and place it in a champagne flute.
Add cognac.
Top with chilled champagne.
Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Chartreuse Swizzle
cocktails.description: A tropical swizzle of green chartreuse, pineapple, lime, and falernum, finished with mint and nutmeg.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a tiki mug filled with crushed ice.
Swizzle until the mug frosts.
Top with more crushed ice.
Garnish with a mint sprig and grated nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Clover Club
cocktails.description: A pre-Prohibition gin sour colored with raspberry syrup and bound with egg white.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker without ice and dry shake.
Add ice and shake again.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Corpse Reviver #2
cocktails.description: A balanced mix of gin, citrus, and aromatics traditionally taken as a morning pick-me-up.
cocktails.instructions:
Rinse a chilled cocktail glass with absinthe and discard the excess.
Shake gin, Cointreau, Lillet Blanc, and lemon juice with ice.
Strain into the prepared glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.description: A citrusy vodka cocktail with cranberry and orange notes.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Cuba Libre
cocktails.description: A simple mix of rum, cola, and lime for a refreshing long drink.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour rum and lime juice over the ice.
Top with cola and stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A classic rum sour balancing lime and sugar.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lime slice.

cocktails.name: Dark 'n Stormy
cocktails.description: Spicy ginger beer topped with dark rum for a stormy refresher.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour dark rum and lime juice over the ice.
Top with ginger beer.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Dirty Girl Scout
cocktails.description: A sweet and strong shot. The recipe here is for 3 shots.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
2. Pour 30ml of vodka, 30ml of coffee liqueur, 30ml of Baileys and 30ml of creme de menthe white.
3. Shake and strain into shot glasses.

cocktails.name: Don's Special Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A tiki-style daiquiri with grapefruit and honey notes.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lime slice.

cocktails.name: Dry Martini
cocktails.description: A timeless mix of gin and dry vermouth served icy cold.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, vermouth, and bitters into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an olive or a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Electric Lemonade
cocktails.description: Named for its electric blue color, the Electric Lemonade cocktail can be shaken or stirred.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add 45ml of vodka, 30ml of lemon juice and 20ml of simple syrup.
Top with 60ml of 7-Up.
Float 15ml of blue curaçao on top.
Garnish with a lemon wedge and maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Espresso Martini
cocktails.description: A smooth vodka martini energized with espresso and coffee liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well to create a foam.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with three coffee beans.

cocktails.name: Fernandito
cocktails.description: Argentina's favorite mix of Fernet and cola over ice.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour Fernet over the ice.
Top with cola and stir gently.
Garnish with a lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Final Ward
cocktails.description: Perhaps the most famous variation of the classic "Last Word" cocktail created by Phil Ward, with rye whiskey instead of gin and lemon juice instead of lime juice.
cocktails.instructions:
Combine 20ml of rye whisky, 20ml of Green Chartreuse, 20ml of maraschino liqueur and 20ml of lemon juice in a cocktail shaker with ice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Fireball
cocktails.description: This recipe is for 3 shots.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
2. Pour 75ml of white rum, 75ml of Goldschläger (cinnamon schnapps) and 3 dashes of Tabasco.
3. Shake well and strain into shots.

cocktails.name: First Word
cocktails.instructions:
Combine gin, maraschino liqueur, dry vermouth, Aperol and lime juice in a shaker with ice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Flaming Dr Pepper
cocktails.description: Although Dr Pepper is not one of ingredients of this cocktail, it is claimed that it tastes like Dr Pepper.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour a pint of beer.
Pour 30ml of amaretto into a shot glass.
Carefully pour 15ml of overproof rum on top of the amaretto.
Light the shot and allow it to burn for several seconds.
Drop the flaming shot into the beer and drink.

cocktails.name: Flaming Lamborghini
cocktails.description: A very strong and beautiful cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 30ml of coffee liqueur into a cocktail glass.
Carefully pour 30ml of sambuca over the coffee liqueur.
Prepare 30ml of Baileys and 30ml of blue curaçao in two separate shots.
Light the sambuca and start drinking through the straw.
Don't stop – drink the two shots into the glass just before you finish the sambuca.

cocktails.name: Flaming Volcano
cocktails.description: This drink is something you want to share with your friends. Just get a volcano bowl, mix everything and add a flame. The ingredients can be varied greatly, so run wild and use long straws in this case!
cocktails.instructions:
Put some crushed ice into a bowl.
Add 30ml of white rum, 30ml of brandy and 30ml of dark rum.
Add 120ml of orange juice, 30ml of lemon juice and 60ml of almond syrup.
Blend well and pour into a volcano bowl.

cocktails.name: Flatliner
cocktails.description: A strong and really invigorating shot.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 20ml of sambuca into a shooter.
Carefully pour 25ml of tequila on top of the sambuca.
Add a dash of Tabasco.

cocktails.name: Fluffy Duck
cocktails.description: A stronger version of the cocktail. If you want something smoother, check out the 'Fluffy Duck 2'.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Pour 30ml of white rum, 30ml of egg liqueur and top with 10ml of cream.
Stir and garnish with a strawberry.

cocktails.name: Fluffy Duck 2
cocktails.description: This sweet and soft drink is the smoother variation of the "Fluffy Duck".
cocktails.instructions:
Put some ice cubes into a highball glass.
Pour 30ml of egg liqueur and 30ml of crème de cacao white, and slowly top with 7-Up according to taste.
Gently stir.

cocktails.name: French 75
cocktails.description: Crisp gin and lemon topped with sparkling champagne.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled champagne flute.
Top with champagne.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: French Connection
cocktails.description: Equal-parts blend of cognac and amaretto served over ice.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour all ingredients into an ice-filled rocks glass.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: French Martini
cocktails.description: Vodka shaken with raspberry liqueur and pineapple juice.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

cocktails.name: Frozen Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A variation of the popular Daiquiri cocktail with ice cream.
cocktails.instructions:
Put some crushed ice into a blender.
Add 45ml of white rum, 20ml of lemon or lime juice, 5ml of sugar syrup and 1 scoop of ice cream.
Blend until it is smooth and pour into a chilled goblet.

cocktails.name: Fuzzy Navel
cocktails.description: This cocktail became popular in the 1980s. 'Fuzzy' refers to the peach and 'navel' to the orange. Peach schnapps and orange juice amounts can be varied. There is a variation called 'Hairy Navel' with vodka.
cocktails.instructions:
Put some ice cubes into a highball glass.
Pour 50ml of peach schnapps.
Top with orange juice, and garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Galliano Hotshot
cocktails.description: A layered shot with Galliano, coffee and cream.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 20ml of Galliano into a shooter glass.
Carefully add 20ml of espresso and 10ml of cream on top of the Galliano.

cocktails.name: Garibaldi
cocktails.description: Italian mix of bitter Campari and fresh orange juice.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour in Campari and orange juice.
Stir gently.
Garnish with an orange wedge.

cocktails.name: Gibson
cocktails.description: A strong gin martini garnished with a silverskin onion.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice and add 60ml of gin and 10ml of dry vermouth.
Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.
Garnish with a silverskin onion peel.

cocktails.name: Gimlet
cocktails.description: A classic gin-based cocktail with a long history.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a mixing glass with ice cubes.
Add 60ml of gin and 15ml of lime juice.
Optionally, add 15ml of sugar syrup.
Stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Gin and Sin
cocktails.description: This cocktail's name speaks for itself. Bright, strong and good for adventure. It may be prepared as a shot.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 30ml of gin, 30ml of lemon juice, 30ml of orange juice and a dash of grenadine.
Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Gin Basil Smash
cocktails.description: Herbal gin sour brightened with fresh basil.
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle basil and simple syrup in a shaker.
Add gin, lemon juice, and ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a rocks glass over ice.
Garnish with a basil leaf.

cocktails.name: Gin Fizz
cocktails.description: Classic gin sour lengthened with soda water.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a highball glass.
Top with soda water.
Garnish with a lemon slice.

cocktails.name: Gin Rickey
cocktails.description: This classic cocktail is considered the best of the 'Rickey' group of drinks, which are made from a base spirit, lime juice and soda.
cocktails.instructions:
Put some ice into a highball glass.
Add 50ml of gin and 30ml of lime juice. Top with soda.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Gin Sour
cocktails.description: The Gin Sour is a classic 'sour' cocktail. It can be served in a cocktail glass or a rocks glass.
cocktails.instructions:
Combine 60ml of gin, 30ml of lemon juice, 15ml of sugar syrup and an optional egg white into a cocktail shaker.
Add ice, shake again, and strain into a cocktail glass or a rocks glass with ice.
Garnish with either a lemon slice and maraschino cherry or with several drops of Angostura bitters.

cocktails.name: Gladiator
cocktails.description: This recipe is for 3 shots, but you can make it as a long drink by mixing all the ingredients together in a collins glass.
cocktails.instructions:
Prepare a shot with 25ml of amaretto and 25ml of peach schnapps.
Mix around 70ml of 7-Up and 70ml of orange juice in a pub glass.
Drop the shooter into the pub glass and drink quickly.

cocktails.name: Godfather
cocktails.description: A good mix of Scotch and amaretto, this rich-flavoured cocktail is an IBA official cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes.
Pour 35ml of Scotch and 35ml of amaretto over the ice.

cocktails.name: Godmother
cocktails.description: Also called "Tawny Russian", this IBA official cocktail is a softer variation of another classic cocktail – Godfather.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes.
Pour 35ml of vodka and 35ml of amaretto over the ice.

cocktails.name: Gold Rush
cocktails.description: A variation of the "Whiskey Sour" with honey instead of sugar syrup.
cocktails.instructions:
Combine 60ml of bourbon, 20ml of lemon juice and 20ml of honey syrup with ice in a cocktail shaker.
Shake well and strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lemon wedge or a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Golden Cadillac
cocktails.description: An after-dinner cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 20ml of Galliano, 20ml of crème de cacao white and 20ml of cream.
Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Golden Dream
cocktails.description: An IBA official cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 20ml of Galliano, 20ml of triple sec, 20ml of orange juice and 10ml of cream.
Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Grand Margarita
cocktails.description: Premium take on the classic Margarita with tequila and Grand Marnier.
cocktails.instructions:
Rim a margarita glass with salt.
Shake tequila, Grand Marnier, lime juice, and agave syrup with ice.
Strain into the prepared glass.
Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Grasshopper
cocktails.description: Creamy after-dinner mix of mint and chocolate liqueurs.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Green Mexican
cocktails.description: A big and quite strong cocktail that is definitely not for everybody!
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a collins glass with ice.
Add 90ml of tequila and 90ml of Midori, then fill the rest with approximately 45ml of lemon juice and 45ml of sugar syrup.

cocktails.name: Green Mexican (shot)
cocktails.description: The shot variation of the "Green Mexican" cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 20ml of Midori into a shooter glass.
Carefully add 10ml of lime juice and 20ml of tequila.

cocktails.name: Green Vesper
cocktails.description: A popular variation of the "Vesper" cocktail invented by James Bond in "Casino Royale". The original recipe has Kina Lillet instead of absinthe.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice.
Add 60ml of gin, 20ml of vodka and 10ml of absinthe.
Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon peel.

cocktails.name: Greyhound
cocktails.description: The Greyhound is a softer variation of the "Salty Dog" without salt. As with the Salty Dog, gin is often substituted with vodka.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a collins glass with ice cubes.
Add 50ml of gin and 200ml of grapefruit juice.
Stir well and garnish with a lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Hairy Navel
cocktails.description: This is a stronger variation of the "Fuzzy Navel" cocktail with vodka.
cocktails.instructions:
Put some ice cubes into a highball glass.
Pour 50ml of peach schnapps and 30ml of vodka.
Top with orange juice, and garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Hanky Panky
cocktails.description: Classic gin and vermouth cocktail with a hint of Fernet.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Hanky Panky
cocktails.description: This IBA official cocktail was invented at the beginning of the 20th century by Ada Coleman, the head bartender of the Savoy Hotel.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a mixing glass with ice cubes.
Pour 45ml of London Dry Gin, 45ml of sweet red vermouth and 8ml of Fernet-Branca.
Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with orange zest.

cocktails.name: Harvey Wallbanger
cocktails.description: This IBA official cocktail was invented in 1952 by famous three-time world champion mixologist Donato "Duke" Antone.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice cubes.
Pour 45ml of vodka and 90ml of orange juice over the ice.
Stir gently and top with 15ml of Galliano.
Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Hazelnut Martini
cocktails.description: An interesting Martini variation with Frangelico (hazelnut liqueur) and cacao liqueur. If you like it mild, some recipes also suggest adding about a half shot of cream.
cocktails.instructions:
Combine 60ml of vodka, 15ml of Frangelico and 15ml of crème de cacao white in a shaker with ice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Hellboy
cocktails.description: A very interesting cocktail if you like whisky-based (especially smoky whisky-based) drinks. It's not too popular throughout the world, but it is known in Zurich bars, notably Old Crow and Widder Bar. Chili-infused honey syrup is difficult to find in stores but easy to make yourself.
cocktails.instructions:
Combine 50ml of Islay whisky, 10ml of Frangelico and half a teaspoon of chili-infused honey.
Stir well and add some ice cubes.
Strain into a rocks glass and add a big ice cube.

cocktails.name: Hemingway Special
cocktails.description: A tart rum sour with grapefruit and maraschino liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Highball
cocktails.description: A classic popular cocktail that is best made with Canadian whisky.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour 60ml of whisky over the ice, and top with ginger ale.

cocktails.name: Hiroshima
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 20ml of sambuca into a shooter glass.
Carefully pour 15ml of Baileys and 15ml of absinthe.
Add several grenadine drops using a straw.

cocktails.name: Horny Bull (long)
cocktails.description: Similar to the Screwdriver but with tequila instead of vodka.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add 50ml of tequila, and top with orange juice.

cocktails.name: Horny Bull (shot)
cocktails.description: This is a strong shooter version of the Horny Bull long drink. Some people prefer it with vodka.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour tequila and rum in equal proportions into a shot glass.
Optionally, add vodka.

cocktails.name: Horse's Neck
cocktails.description: Cognac highball sharpened with ginger ale and bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add cognac and bitters.
Top with ginger ale.
Garnish with a long lemon peel.

cocktails.name: Hot Buttered Rum
cocktails.description: A traditional hot winter drink. Some recipes suggest using warm cider instead of water. The sugar in the recipe can be substituted with honey.
cocktails.instructions:
Put 1 teaspoon of butter into a toddy (Irish coffee) glass.
Add 1-2 teaspoons of dark sugar, 1 dash of ground cinnamon and 1/16 teaspoon of ground nutmeg.
Pour 50ml of rum and top with 100ml of hot (not boiling) water.
Stir well until the butter and sugar are dissolved.
Garnish with a cinnamon stick and a lemon slice.

cocktails.name: Hot Toddy
cocktails.description: A warming mix of whiskey, honey, lemon and hot water.
cocktails.instructions:
Put 1 teaspoon of honey on the bottom of an Irish coffee glass.
Pour 45ml of whiskey and squeeze in a quarter of a lemon.
Fill the glass with 100ml of hot water or tea.

cocktails.name: Hurricane
cocktails.description: A classic tropical cocktail popularized in 1940s New Orleans.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice.
Add white rum, dark rum, optional overproof rum, passion fruit puree, orange juice, lime juice, grenadine and simple syrup.
Shake well and strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice.
Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

cocktails.name: IBA Tiki
cocktails.description: Fruity tiki blend of rums, juices, and exotic syrups.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients except garnishes into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a tiki glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish with mint and pineapple.

cocktails.name: Illegal
cocktails.description: Smoky mezcal balanced with herbal Chartreuse and lime.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Improved Scotch Sling
cocktails.description: Scotch-based take on the Improved Whisky Cocktail with honey and maraschino.
cocktails.instructions:
Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled.
Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.
Garnish with a lemon peel.

cocktails.name: Incredible Hulk
cocktails.description: A vibrant green mix of cognac and Hpnotiq named after the comic book hero.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Pour 50ml of Hpnotiq and 50ml of cognac over the ice.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Innocent Sex
cocktails.description: Layered shooter of sambuca, Cointreau and Irish cream.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 20ml of sambuca into a shooter glass.
Carefully add 15ml of Cointreau and 15ml of Baileys.
If desired, light it and drink through a straw.

cocktails.name: Irish Car Bomb
cocktails.description: Drop a shot of whiskey and Irish cream into stout for a quick-drinking bomb.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 250ml of Guinness into a pub glass.
Pour 30ml of Baileys into a shot glass and gently add 20ml of whiskey.
Drop the shot into the stout and drink immediately.

cocktails.name: Irish Coffee
cocktails.description: Warm blend of Irish whiskey, hot coffee, and cream.
cocktails.instructions:
Add brown sugar to a heatproof glass.
Pour in hot coffee and stir until dissolved.
Add Irish whisky and stir.
Float lightly whipped cream on top.

cocktails.name: Irish Flag
cocktails.description: Layered shot showing the green, white and orange of the Irish flag.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 20ml of green crème de menthe into a shooter.
Carefully layer 15ml of Baileys and 15ml of Grand Marnier on top.

cocktails.name: Irish Frog
cocktails.description: Simple layered shot with melon liqueur and Irish cream.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 25ml of Midori into a shooter.
Carefully add 25ml of Baileys on top of the Midori.

cocktails.name: Jack and Coke
cocktails.description: Simple and popular mix of Jack Daniel's and cola.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a collins glass with ice.
Pour 50ml of Jack Daniel's and 150ml of cola over the ice.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Jack Rose
cocktails.description: Early 20th century classic of apple brandy, lemon and grenadine.
cocktails.instructions:
Add calvados, the juice of half a lemon, grenadine and optional egg into a shaker with ice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist or apple slice.

cocktails.name: Jägerbomb
cocktails.description: Also called "Flying Meister" or "Turbojäger" in German-speaking countries.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour half a can of Red Bull into a pub glass.
Make a shot of Jägermeister, and drop it into the glass with the Red Bull.

cocktails.name: Jagertee
cocktails.description: Hot black tea spiked with overproof rum and sweetened to taste.
cocktails.instructions:
Make a cup of black tea.
Add 40ml of overproof rum.
Add sugar according to your taste.

cocktails.name: Japanese Slipper
cocktails.description: This popular cocktail was created in 1984 by Jean-Paul Bourguignon at Mietta's Restaurant in Melbourne.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 30ml of Midori, 30ml of Cointreau and 30ml of lemon juice.
Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.
Garnish with a small slice of honeydew melon.

cocktails.name: Jelly Bean
cocktails.description: Layered shooter with grenadine, sambuca and Southern Comfort.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 15ml of grenadine into a shooter.
Carefully add 15ml of sambuca and 15ml of Southern Comfort on top of the grenadine.

cocktails.name: Jellyfish
cocktails.description: A mild and nice-looking shot that slightly resembles a jellyfish.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 25ml of crème de cacao white into a shooter glass.
Gently add 10ml of amaretto on top.
Gently pour 15ml of Baileys on top of the amaretto.
Add a few drops of grenadine.

cocktails.name: Jellyfish 2
cocktails.description: A stronger variation of the Jellyfish cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 15ml of sambuca into a shooter glass.
Gently add 15ml of blue curaçao on top.
Gently pour 15ml of Baileys on top of the blue curaçao.
Add a few drops of grenadine.

cocktails.name: Jellyfish 3
cocktails.description: Yet another variation of the Jellyfish cocktail. This one is the strongest one.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 15ml of blue curaçao into a shooter glass.
Gently add 15ml of tequila on top.
Gently add 15ml of absinthe on top of the tequila.
Add a drop of Baileys.

cocktails.name: John Collins
cocktails.description: Refreshing gin highball with lemon, sugar, and soda.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup into a collins glass filled with ice.
Top with soda water and stir gently.
Garnish with a lemon slice and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Jolly Rancher
cocktails.description: Named after the popular American candy brand.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Pour 30ml of vodka, 30ml of Midori melon liqueur and 90ml of cranberry juice.
Shake and pour over the ice into a highball glass.

cocktails.name: Jungle Bird
cocktails.description: Tiki favorite blending dark rum, Campari, and pineapple.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

cocktails.name: Kamikaze
cocktails.description: This popular cocktail is a variation of the original Kamikaze shooter.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 45ml of vodka, 15ml of triple sec and 5ml of lime juice.
Shake well and strain into a shooter glass.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Kir
cocktails.description: Simple mix of white wine and blackcurrant liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour creme de cassis into a wine glass.
Top with white wine.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Ladykiller
cocktails.description: The very sweet and beautiful 1984 championship-winning cocktail created by Peter Roth from the Kronenhalle bar in Zürich.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Pour 30ml of gin, 15ml of Cointreau and 15ml of apricot brandy.
Add 60ml of passion fruit juice and 60ml of pineapple juice.
Shake and strain into a highball glass with 6-8 ice cubes.
Garnish with an orange peel, a cherry and mint leaves.

cocktails.name: Last Word
cocktails.description: Equal-parts gin, Chartreuse, maraschino, and lime.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Lava Flow
cocktails.description: A beautiful and mild cocktail. The recipe here is for 3–4 big glasses.
cocktails.instructions:
Blend 180g of strawberries with 90ml of light rum and 180ml of Malibu coconut rum.
Add a peeled banana, 180ml of coconut cream and 180ml of pineapple juice and blend again.
Pour into hurricane glasses over the strawberry puree.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

cocktails.name: Lemon Drop Martini
cocktails.description: An IBA official variation of the Martini drink that is served as an all-day cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 30ml of vodka, 20ml of triple sec and 15ml of lemon juice.
Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

cocktails.name: Light Word
cocktails.instructions:
Combine gin, Campari, green Chartreuse and lime juice in a shaker with ice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled wine glass.

cocktails.name: Liquid Cocaine
cocktails.description: A very strong cocktail. Goldschläger is often substituted with other flavored schnapps or tequila. The recipe here is for 3 shots.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 50ml of overproof rum, 50ml of Goldschläger and 50ml of Jägermeister.
Shake well and strain into shots.

cocktails.name: Liquid Marijuana Long
cocktails.description: A quite complicated but beautiful toxic-colored exotic cocktail. There is also a much stronger shot version of this drink.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 15ml of dark rum, 15ml of blue curaçao, 15ml of Malibu and 15ml of Midori into a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add 60ml of pineapple juice and 15ml of simple syrup and shake with ice.
Strain into a highball or hurricane glass over the ice.

cocktails.name: Liquid Marijuana Shot
cocktails.description: Unlike the long and mild version of the "Liquid Marijuana", this version is a strong shot but an equally beautiful drink.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 30ml of dark rum, 30ml of blue curaçao, 30ml of Malibu and 30ml of Midori into a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add 30ml of pineapple juice, 30ml of lemon juice and 15ml of simple syrup.
Shake well and strain into shooter glasses.

cocktails.name: London Calling
cocktails.description: Created in 2002 in London's Milk & Honey bar by Chris Jepson for a magazine competition. A well-known variation is the "Banana Calling".
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 45ml of dry gin, 15ml of dry sherry, 10ml of lemon juice and 10ml of simple syrup into a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add 2 dashes of Angostura bitters and shake well.
Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora or martini glass.
Garnish with a grapefruit twist.

cocktails.name: Long Beach Iced Tea
cocktails.description: A variation of the Long Island Iced Tea with cranberry juice instead of cola.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour 15ml of vodka, tequila, white rum, triple sec and gin.
Add 25ml of lemon juice and 30ml of simple syrup.
Top with a splash of cranberry juice.

cocktails.name: Long Island Iced Tea
cocktails.description: Five-spirit sour lengthened with cola.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all spirits, lemon juice, and simple syrup into a highball glass filled with ice. 
Top up with cola and stir.
Garnish with a lemon slice.

cocktails.name: Love & Murder
cocktails.instructions:
Add Campari, green Chartreuse, lime juice and sugar syrup into a shaker with ice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled coupe.
Add a pinch of salt on top if desired.

cocktails.name: Lucien Gaudin
cocktails.description: A cocktail named after Lucien Gaudin, a French fencer who won two gold medals in the 1924 and 1928 Olympic games, named similarly to the Negroni, with the addition of orange liqueur and with dry vermouth instead of sweet vermouth.
cocktails.instructions:
Combine 30ml of gin, 15ml of dry vermouth, 15ml of Cointreau and 15ml of Campari in a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Lynchburg Lemonade
cocktails.description: A popular cocktail named after Lynchburg, Tennessee, the hometown of the Jack Daniel's Distillery.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a collins glass with ice.
Pour 30ml of Jack Daniels, 15ml of triple sec, 15ml of lemon juice and 15ml of sugar syrup.
Top with lemonade.
Garnish with a lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.description: Rum-forward tiki classic with orange curaçao, lime, and orgeat.
cocktails.instructions:
Add rums, orange curaçao, lime juice, and orgeat into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish with a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Malibu Bay Breeze
cocktails.description: A simple, light and delicious cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
Put some ice cubes into a highball glass.
Pour 45ml of Malibu, 60ml of cranberry juice and 60ml of pineapple juice over the ice.
Garnish with a slice of pineapple.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.description: Spirit-forward mix of rye whisky, sweet vermouth, and bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Manhattan Dry
cocktails.description: A good pre-dinner cocktail that is a variation of the Manhattan with dry vermouth.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a mixing glass with ice cubes.
Pour 50ml of rye or Canadian whisky with 20ml of dry vermouth into a mixing glass.
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters.
Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Manhattan Medium
cocktails.description: Also called Perfect Manhattan, this is a combination of Manhattan and Manhattan Dry.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a mixing glass with ice cubes.
Pour 50ml of rye or Canadian whisky with 10ml of dry vermouth and 10ml of red vermouth into a mixing glass.
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters.
Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.description: Classic tequila sour balanced with triple sec and lime.
cocktails.instructions:
Rim a margarita glass with salt.
Add tequila, triple sec, and lime juice into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into the prepared glass.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Martinez
cocktails.description: Historic gin and vermouth cocktail accented by maraschino and orange bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Martini Chocolate
cocktails.description: A dessert-style martini with rich chocolate flavour.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 45ml of vodka and 45ml of crème de cacao.
Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with chocolate shavings or cocoa powder.

cocktails.name: Martini Dirty
cocktails.description: An IBA official variation of the Martini drink.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a mixing glass with ice cubes.
Add 60ml of vodka, 10ml of dry vermouth and 10ml of olive juice.
Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.
Garnish with an olive.

cocktails.name: Martini Perfect
cocktails.description: This is a combination of the Dry and Sweet Martini cocktails that makes a good pre-dinner cocktail. The amount of gin can be varied according to your taste.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a mixing glass with ice cubes.
Add 55ml of gin, 10ml of dry vermouth and 10ml of red vermouth.
Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon peel and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Martini Sweet
cocktails.description: This is a variation of the Martini cocktail with sweet red vermouth instead of dry vermouth. The vodka to vermouth ratio can be varied according to your taste.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a mixing glass with ice cubes.
Add 55ml of vodka and 15ml of sweet red vermouth.
Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Martini Vodka
cocktails.description: This is a vodka-based variation of the Martini cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a mixing glass with ice cubes.
Add 55ml of vodka and 15ml of dry vermouth.
Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.
Squeeze a lemon peel into the drink and garnish with a green olive.

cocktails.name: Mary Pickford
cocktails.description: Tropical rum and pineapple cocktail sweetened with maraschino and grenadine.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Melon Ball
cocktails.description: A very nice and smooth drink that's easy to make. Use less juice if you'd like the cocktail to be stronger.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice cubes.
Pour 30ml of vodka and 60ml of melon liqueur.
Top with orange juice.

cocktails.name: Mexican Mule
cocktails.description: The Mexican Mule — also known as El Burro or the Jalisco Mule — is a variation on the Moscow Mule, using tequila in place of the usual vodka. Sugar syrup can be added to make a sweeter drink.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 60ml of tequila blanco into a copper mug or Collins glass filled with crushed ice.
Add 15ml of lime juice, 90ml of ginger beer and, optionally, 15ml of sugar syrup.
Garnish with a slice of lime.

cocktails.name: Miami Beach
cocktails.description: Fill a shaker with ice cubes. Add 30ml of Scotch, 30ml of dry vermouth and 30ml of grapefruit juice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 30ml of Scotch, 30ml of dry vermouth and 30ml of grapefruit juice.
Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Michelada
cocktails.description: Legend has it that the Michelada was invented in the Mexican city San Luis Potosí, either by General Don Augusto Michel in the 1920s or by a bar regular named Michel Esper in the 1970s. Many variations exist, with the amount of lime juice, sauces and juice can be varied according to taste.
cocktails.instructions:
Rim a pint glass or highball glass with salt and, optionally, chili powder. Fill the glass with ice.
Add 30ml lime juice, 2 dashes of tabasco, 2 dashes of Worcestershire sauce and, optionally, 30ml of tomato juice.
Pour 355ml of beer and stir.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Midori Illusion
cocktails.description: A sweet and fresh popular cocktail. Many varieties exist, such as stronger ones with less pineapple juice and those without lemon juice and blue curaçao.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 45ml of Midori, 15ml of triple sec, 15ml of vodka, 20ml of lemon juice and 45ml of pineapple juice.
Shake and strain into a highball or hurricane glass.
Optionally top with lemonade.

cocktails.name: Midori Sour
cocktails.description: One of the classic sours.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes.
Add 50ml of Midori, 20ml of lemon juice and 20ml of sugar syrup.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Milano Torino
cocktails.description: Also known as "Mi-To," this cocktail was created around 1860 in a cafe in Milan, Italy. It is named after the ingredients: Campari is from Milan, and sweet vermouth is from Turin. With the addition of soda, this drink turns into the "Americano" cocktail, and with gin, it turns into the "Negroni."
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Add 30ml of Campari and 30ml of sweet red vermouth.
Stir and garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Mimosa
cocktails.description: Brunch favorite combining sparkling wine and fresh orange juice.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour orange juice into a chilled champagne flute.
Top with champagne.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Mind Eraser
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes.
Add 30ml of vodka, 30ml of coffee liqueur and 30ml of tonic water.
Stir slightly.

cocktails.name: Mint Julep
cocktails.description: Bourbon refresher with muddled mint and sugar over crushed ice.
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle mint leaves, sugar, and water in a rocks glass.
Fill the glass with crushed ice.
Add bourbon and stir until chilled.
Garnish with a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Missionary's Downfall
cocktails.description: Blended tiki mix of rum, peach liqueur, pineapple, mint, and honey.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients to a blender with ice.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a highball glass.
Garnish with a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.description: Cuban highball with rum, lime, mint, sugar, and sparkling soda.
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle mint leaves and sugar with lime juice in a highball glass.
Add rum and fill the glass with crushed ice.
Top with soda water and gently stir.
Garnish with a mint sprig and lime slice.

cocktails.name: Mojito Pomegranate
cocktails.description: A pomegranate variation of Mojito.
cocktails.instructions:
Put 4 sprigs of mint and 2 teaspoons of sugar into a highball glass.
Add 30ml of lime juice and muddle mint sprigs.
Fill the glass with crushed ice.
Pour 40ml of white rum and 50ml of pomegranate juice, and top with 100ml of soda water.
Garnish with a sprig of mint leaves.

cocktails.name: Monkey Gland
cocktails.description: Gin and orange cocktail with a hint of absinthe and grenadine.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, orange juice, absinthe, and grenadine into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Moscow Mule
cocktails.description: Vodka and ginger beer built over ice with a bright lime kick.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a copper mug with ice.
Add vodka and lime juice.
Top with ginger beer and gently stir.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Mudslide
cocktails.description: A variation of the classic "Black Russian" cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes.
Pour 30ml of vodka, 30ml of coffee liqueur and 30ml of Baileys.
Stir slightly with a mixing tin.

cocktails.name: Mulled Wine
cocktails.description: Also called "Glühwein" in German, this drink is very popular in German-speaking countries, France and Russia. Spices can be varied greatly – just use what you like.
cocktails.instructions:
Heat a bottle or more of red wine in a pan.
Add cinnamon sticks, cloves, sugar and vanilla pods.
Add lemon wedges, and wait 10 minutes.
Heat until the wine almost boils, and serve in cups.

cocktails.name: Naked and Famous
cocktails.description: Equal parts mezcal, Aperol, yellow chartreuse, and lime for a smoky, bittersweet sour.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Naked Lady
cocktails.description: A very interesting combination of gentle sweetness and a light touch of sour, resulting in a delicious, classic drink.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 50ml of white rum and 50ml of red vermouth.
Add 10ml of apricot brandy, 10ml of grenadine and 10ml of lemon juice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon peel.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.description: Classic Italian aperitif of gin, bitters, and sweet vermouth.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, Campari, and red vermouth into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled rocks glass over fresh ice.
Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Negroni Sbagliato
cocktails.description: A twist on the classic Negroni where prosecco replaces gin, yielding a lighter and fruitier drink.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes.
Add 30ml of Campari and 30ml of red vermouth.
Top with sparkling wine.
Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Neptune's Wrath
cocktails.description: The creation of this cocktail is credited to Toby Malone, who first prepared it for the Violet Hour in Chicago.
cocktails.instructions:
Add 45ml of gin, 20ml of lemon juice, 20ml of simple syrup, an egg white and 7ml of absinthe to a cocktail shaker.
Shake without ice to foam the egg white, then add ice and shake again.
Strain into a cocktail glass.
Flame 7ml of green Chartreuse in a separate container and pour it on top.

cocktails.name: New York Sour
cocktails.description: Whiskey sour finished with a float of red wine.
cocktails.instructions:
Add bourbon, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white into a shaker without ice.
Dry shake to emulsify.
Add ice and shake again until chilled.
Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.
Float red wine on top.

cocktails.name: Nutty Irishman
cocktails.description: A nice, sweet and mild drink if you like creamy cocktails, like the Alexander or Butter Cream. If you want it stronger, just add a bit of Irish whiskey. Another variation is to make it in a coffee mug, mixing it with a cup of coffee.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add 30ml of Frangelico, 30ml of Baileys and 30ml of cream.
Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Optionally, top with loose whipped cream.
Garnish with grated nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Oatmeal Cookie
cocktails.description: A very mild and sweet cocktail that resembles oatmeal cookies. Some variations exclude Jägermeister from the recipe. The recipe here is for 3–4 shots.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 30ml of Goldschläger and 30ml of butterscotch liqueur.
Add 30ml of Baileys and optionally 30ml of Jägermeister.
Shake well and strain into shooter glasses.

cocktails.name: Old Cuban
cocktails.description: Sparkling mix of aged rum, mint, lime, and champagne.
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle mint leaves with simple syrup in a shaker.
Add rum, lime juice, and bitters with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Top with champagne and garnish with a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.description: Time-honored mix of whiskey, sugar, and bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
Place sugar in a rocks glass and saturate with bitters.
Add a splash of water and muddle until dissolved.
Fill the glass with ice and add bourbon.
Stir gently.
Garnish with an orange twist and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Orgasm
cocktails.description: Many versions of this sweet shooter. It may be served on the rocks or layered in a shot. "Screaming Orgasm" is another variation of this cocktail made with vodka.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Pour 30ml of Cointreau, 30ml of Baileys and 20ml of Grand Marnier over the ice.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Orgasm #2
cocktails.description: A variation of the "Orgasm" cocktail made with amaretto and coffee liqueur instead of Cointreau and Grand Marnier.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 15ml of coffee liqueur into a shooter glass.
Add 15ml of Baileys on top of the coffee liqueur and 15ml of amaretto on top of the Baileys.

cocktails.name: Painkiller
cocktails.description: A signature drink of Pusser's Rum, first created in the 1970s by Daphne Henderson at the Soggy Dollar Bar in the British Virgin Islands.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 60ml of dark rum, 30ml of coconut milk, 90ml of pineapple juice and 30ml of orange juice.
Shake well and pour into a highball glass.
Garnish with grated nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Paloma
cocktails.description: Refreshing tequila highball with grapefruit soda and lime.
cocktails.instructions:
Rim a highball glass with salt.
Fill the glass with ice and add tequila and lime juice.
Top with grapefruit soda and stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Panama
cocktails.description: A variation of the "Brandy Alexander" with crème de cacao white instead of dark.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 30ml of cognac, 30ml of crème de cacao white and 30ml of cream.
Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.
Garnish with grated nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Pantera Rosa
cocktails.description: The Pantera Rosa — meaning Pink Panther — was named for its vibrant pink color.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add 45ml of gin, 15ml of limoncello, 30ml of lemon juice, 20ml of simple syrup and 2 raspberries.
Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a float of fresh mint.

cocktails.name: Papaya Rum Punch
cocktails.instructions:
2 oz papaya juice (about ½ cup of papaya chunks)
1 oz white rum
1 oz orange juice, freshly squeezed
½ oz triple sec
¼ oz simple syrup
2 oz club soda

cocktails.name: Papaya Smash
cocktails.instructions:
2 papaya slices, divided
3/4 ounce agave nectar
1 1/2 ounces añejo tequila
1/2 ounce Aperol
3/4 ounce freshly squeezed lime juice
1/2 ounce freshly squeezed orange juice

cocktails.name: Paper Plane
cocktails.description: Modern equal-parts cocktail of bourbon, Aperol, amaro, and lemon.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Paradise
cocktails.description: Pre-Prohibition blend of gin, apricot brandy, and orange juice.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Pedro Manhattan
cocktails.description: This cocktail was invented at Moscow's bar Delicatessen, which even has a counter, displaying the number of drinks served in real time. The Pedro Manhattan is a variation on the classic Manhattan cocktail that replaces the traditional sweet vermouth with Pedro Ximenez sherry. The Pedro Manhattan is a great choice for those who enjoy the classic Manhattan cocktail but want to try something a little different, with a unique flavor profile.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a mixing glass with ice cubes.
Add 50ml of bourbon, 20ml of Pedro Ximenez, 1 dash of Angostura Bitters and 2 dashes of Peychaud's Bitters.
Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Penicillin
cocktails.description: Smoky scotch cocktail with honey, ginger, and lemon.
cocktails.instructions:
Add blended scotch, lemon juice, honey syrup, and ginger syrup into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.
Float Islay scotch on top and garnish with a slice of ginger.

cocktails.name: Pete's Word
cocktails.description: A smoky take on the Last Word with Laphroaig, maraschino liqueur and green Chartreuse.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 30ml of Laphroaig, 30ml of maraschino liqueur, 30ml of green Chartreuse and the juice of half a lime.
Shake and strain into a chilled wine glass.

cocktails.name: Piña Colada
cocktails.description: Tropical blend of rum, pineapple, and coconut cream.
cocktails.instructions:
Add rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice into a blender with crushed ice.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Pink Lady
cocktails.description: A classic gin-based cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 45ml of gin, 15ml of strawberry syrup, 15ml of grenadine and an egg white.
Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.
Garnish with a cherry.

cocktails.name: Pisco Punch
cocktails.description: Fruity highball of pisco with pineapple and citrus.
cocktails.instructions:
Add pisco, pineapple juice, lime juice, and simple syrup into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a highball glass filled with ice.
Top with soda water and garnish with a pineapple wedge.

cocktails.name: Pisco Sour
cocktails.description: Peruvian classic with pisco, lime, and creamy egg white foam.
cocktails.instructions:
Add pisco, lime juice, simple syrup, and egg white into a shaker without ice.
Dry shake to mix.
Add ice and shake again until chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish the foam with a few drops of Angostura bitters.

cocktails.name: Planter's Punch
cocktails.description: Jamaican rum punch with citrus, grenadine, and a touch of bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
Add rum, orange juice, pineapple juice, lime juice, and grenadine into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Pour into a highball glass and top with soda water.
Dash bitters on top and garnish with a pineapple slice.

cocktails.name: Porn Star Martini
cocktails.description: A modern passion fruit martini served with a shot of prosecco.
cocktails.instructions:
Add vanilla vodka, passion fruit liqueur, passion fruit syrup, lime juice, and vanilla syrup into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Serve with prosecco on the side.
Garnish with half a passion fruit.

cocktails.name: Porto Flip
cocktails.description: A rich blend of cognac, ruby port, and egg yolk topped with grated nutmeg.
cocktails.instructions:
Add cognac, ruby port, and egg yolk into a shaker with ice.
Shake vigorously.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with grated nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Rabo de Galo
cocktails.description: Brazilian mix of cachaça, Cynar, and red vermouth with an orange twist.
cocktails.instructions:
Add cachaça, red vermouth, and Cynar into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice.
Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Ramos Gin Fizz
cocktails.description: A frothy gin fizz with citrus, cream, and a hint of orange flower water.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, lemon juice, lime juice, simple syrup, cream, egg white, orange flower water, and vanilla extract into a shaker without ice.
Dry shake for two minutes vigorously.
Add ice and shake again until chilled.
Strain into a highball glass without ice.
Top with soda water.

cocktails.name: Rattlesnake
cocktails.description: A strong whiskey-based cocktail from the 1930 "The Savoy Cocktail Book." The comment for the drink says "So called because it will either cure Rattlesnake bite, or kill Rattlesnake, and, moreover, make you see double."
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 60ml of rye whisky and a dash of absinthe into a cocktail shaker without ice.
Add 2 teaspoons of lemon juice, 2 teaspoons of simple syrup and half an egg white.
Shake vigorously to make the drink frothy.
Add ice, shake again, and strain into a cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Redheaded Slut
cocktails.description: Also known as "Ginger bitch," this can also be made as a long drink. The recipe here is for 3 shots.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Pour 40ml of Jägermeister, 40ml of peach schnapps and 70ml of cranberry juice.
Shake well and strain into shots.

cocktails.name: Remember the Maine
cocktails.description: A Manhattan variation with rye whisky, cherry heering, and a hint of absinthe.
cocktails.instructions:
Rinse a chilled cocktail glass with absinthe and discard the excess.
Add rye whisky, cherry heering, and red vermouth into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into the prepared glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Right Word
cocktails.description: A floral riff on the Last Word with gin, St. Germain and Lillet Blanc.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add gin, St. Germain, Lillet Blanc and half a lime.
Shake and strain into a chilled wine glass.

cocktails.name: Roasted Toasted Almond
cocktails.description: A stronger variation of the "Toasted Almond" with vodka.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Add 30ml of amaretto, 30ml of coffee liqueur and 30ml of vodka, and top with cream.
Stir slightly.

cocktails.name: Rob Roy
cocktails.description: The drink is a variation of the Manhattan cocktail with Scotch whisky. It is named for the Scottish folk hero Robert Roy MacGregor, the "Scottish Robin Hood." This cocktail first appeared in New York around 1890.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a mixing glass with ice cubes.
Add 45ml of Scotch Whiskey, 25ml of red vermouth and 1 dash of Angostura Bitters.
Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Rocket Fuel
cocktails.description: A very strong cocktail. The ingredients can be varied greatly, and the cocktail is basically a mixture of strong spirits.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice cubes.
Add 30ml of vodka, 30ml of triple sec, 30ml of white rum, 30ml of gin and 30ml of tequila.
Top with lemonade or 7up and stir well.

cocktails.name: Rose
cocktails.description: An IBA official pre-dinner cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a mixing glass with ice.
Add 40ml of dry vermouth, 20ml of kirsch and 3 dashes of strawberry syrup.
Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Roy Rogers
cocktails.description: A refreshing non-alcoholic cocktail named after the famous actor and singer.
cocktails.instructions:
Put some ice cubes into a highball glass.
Pour 10ml of grenadine, and fill the glass with cola.
Stir well and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Rum Old Fashioned
cocktails.description: A variation of the classic "Old Fashioned" cocktail with aged rum instead of bourbon or rye. Some recipes also suggest adding a small amount of high-proof overproof rum.
cocktails.instructions:
Place a sugar cube in a rocks glass and saturate it with Angostura bitters and, optionally, orange bitters.
Add a few dashes of plain water, and stir until the sugar is dissolved, and add 45ml of quality aged rum and, optionally, 10ml of overproof rum.
Add some ice cubes and stir again.
Garnish with an orange or lemon peel, and squeeze it a bit to release the oils.

cocktails.name: Rum Rickey
cocktails.description: "Rickey" is a family of drinks made with some base liquor, lime juice and sparkling water. One of the most popular is the "Gin Rickey", which is made with gin.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add 50ml of white rum and 30ml of lime juice. Top with soda water.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Rusty Nail
cocktails.description: Scotch whisky tempered with sweet, herbal Drambuie.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour scotch whiskey and Drambuie into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Stir gently.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Salty Dog
cocktails.description: This popular cocktail is a variation of "Greyhound." Historically, it's a gin drink, but gin may be substituted with vodka.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 40ml of gin and 100ml of grapefruit juice.
Pour into a salt-rimmed highball glass with ice.

cocktails.name: San Francisco
cocktails.description: This little-known cocktail first appeared in 1937 in the "Café Royal Cocktail Book", published by the UK Bartenders Guild.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a mixing glass with ice.
Add 30ml of sloe gin, 30ml of dry vermouth and 30ml of red vermouth into the mixing glass.
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters and 1 dash of orange bitters.
Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Sangria
cocktails.description: A refreshing drink that is popular during the summer, especially in Spain and Portugal. The ingredients can be varied — you can use white wine instead of red wine and your own choice of fruits, juices, and sparkling water or soda. The drink is named after the Spanish word sangre, which means "blood." The recipe here is for a 1L pitcher. The drink can be refrigerated before serving.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour one bottle of red or white wine into a pitcher.
Cut an orange and a lemon into wedges, and slightly squeeze them into the pitcher.
Add other fruits (optional).
Add 3–4 teaspoons of sugar or honey.
Add 5 cl of brandy and, optionally, 200ml of ginger ale or soda if you want the drink to be softer.
Before serving, add some ice cubes, stir and strain into glasses. Garnish with fruit slices.

cocktails.name: Sangrita
cocktails.description: A non-alcoholic drink that usually accompanies tequila shots. You drink a shot of Sangrita after taking a shot of tequila. Many variations of the Sangrita recipe exist; the current recipe is not an authentic Mexican version, but the idea is that the drink is popular and easy to make. The recipe here is for a 1L pitcher of Sangrita.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 600ml of tomato juice and 300ml of orange juice into a pitcher.
Add 100ml of lime juice, 20ml of Tabasco and 1–2 teaspoons of pepper and salt.
Garnish with an orange slice and celery.

cocktails.name: Sazerac
cocktails.description: New Orleans classic of rye whisky, sugar, Peychaud's bitters, and an absinthe rinse.
cocktails.instructions:
Rinse a chilled rocks glass with absinthe and discard any excess.
Muddle the sugar with Peychaud's bitters in a mixing glass.
Add rye whisky and ice and stir until chilled.
Strain into the prepared glass without ice.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Scarlett O'Hara
cocktails.description: A fruity cocktail named after the heroine of 'Gone with the Wind'.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a collins glass with ice.
Add 60ml of Southern Comfort and 10ml of lime juice.
Top with cranberry juice, and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Screaming Orgasm
cocktails.description: A stronger variation of the "Orgasm" cocktail made with vodka.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 10ml of vodka, 10ml of amaretto, 10ml of coffee liqueur and 10ml of Baileys.
Shake and strain into a shooter glass.

cocktails.name: Screwdriver
cocktails.description: A simple and popular IBA official cocktail. The drink reportedly got its name because American petroleum engineers in Saudi Arabia secretly added vodka to small cans of orange juice and stirred the mixture with their screwdrivers.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice cubes.
Pour 50ml of vodka and 100ml of orange juice over the ice.
Stir gently and garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Sea Breeze
cocktails.description: Cranberry and grapefruit highball spiked with vodka.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add vodka, cranberry juice, and grapefruit juice.
Stir briefly.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Sex on the Beach
cocktails.description: Fruity vodka highball with peach, orange, and cranberry.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour vodka, peach schnapps, orange juice, and cranberry juice over the ice.
Stir gently.
Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Sexy Alligator
cocktails.description: A layered cocktail combining Midori, pineapple juice, amaretto and Jägermeister.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Pour 30ml of Midori and 30ml of pineapple juice.
Shake well and strain into a martini glass.
Carefully add 30ml of amaretto, and allow it to go to the bottom.
Carefully add 15ml of Jägermeister on top.

cocktails.name: Sherry Cobbler
cocktails.description: Classic sherry cooler muddled with citrus and berries.
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle orange slices and sugar in a cup glass.
Add sherry and fill the cup with crushed ice.
Stir well.
Garnish with orange slices and berries.

cocktails.name: Shirley Temple
cocktails.description: A simple and popular non-alcoholic cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a collins glass with ice cubes.
Add 60ml of ginger ale and 60ml of lemonade, or just add 120ml of ginger ale.
Add 5ml of grenadine.
Stir well and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Sidecar
cocktails.description: Cognac sour sweetened with orange liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
Add cognac, Cointreau, and lemon juice into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Silver Bullet
cocktails.description: Not for everybody, as the rich Scotch flavor and gin will blow your head off. The gin to Scotch ratio can be varied greatly. This drink can also be made as a shooter.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker or mixing glass with ice.
Add 30ml of Scotch whisky and 60ml of gin.
Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Singapore Sling
cocktails.description: Tropical gin punch with cherry, pineapple, and bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, cherry heering, Cointreau, Benedictine, pineapple juice, lime juice, grenadine, and bitters into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a highball glass filled with ice.
Top with soda water.
Garnish with a pineapple slice and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Slippery Nipple
cocktails.description: A very smooth and beautiful shot.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 20ml of sambuca into a shooter glass.
Carefully pour 25ml of Baileys on top of the sambuca.
Add a dash of grenadine syrup (optional).

cocktails.name: Smoky Whiskey Sour
cocktails.description: A variation of the classic "Whisky Sour" created by Simon Difford for people who like the distinct smoky flavor of Scotch Islay whisky.
cocktails.instructions:
Combine 30ml of Islay single malt Scotch and 30ml of scotch whisky in a cocktail shaker.
Add 30ml of lemon juice, 20ml of maple syrup and a dash of Angostura bitters.
Add 1 egg white and dry shake without ice.
Add ice and shake again.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lemon peel.

cocktails.name: Sneaky Pete
cocktails.description: Another variation of the classic 'White Russian' cocktail made with whiskey instead of vodka.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes.
Pour 30ml of rye whisky, 30ml of coffee liqueur and 30ml of milk.
Stir well.

cocktails.name: Snowball
cocktails.description: Simple and delicious. In the UK, it may be called the 'Winter Warmer'.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 60ml of egg liqueur into a collins glass.
Optionally, add 15ml of lime juice.
Carefully fill to the top with lemonade.

cocktails.name: South Side
cocktails.description: Herbal gin sour brightened with mint.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, and mint leaves into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a mint leaf.

cocktails.name: Spiced Rum Milk Punch
cocktails.description: A creamy punch blending spiced rum with milk, vanilla and warm spices.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Pour 45ml of spiced rum, 90ml of milk and 22ml of simple syrup.
Add a dash of vanilla extract and stir.
Garnish with grated cinnamon and grated nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Spicy Fifty
cocktails.description: Vanilla vodka sour shaken with elderflower, honey, and chili heat.
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle a slice of red chili pepper in a shaker.
Add vanilla vodka, elderflower liqueur, lime juice, and honey syrup with ice.
Shake well and fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a red chili slice.

cocktails.name: Spritz Veneziano
cocktails.description: An IBA official sparkling cocktail. Prosecco is recommended for the sparkling wine.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a wine glass with ice.
Add 90ml of sparkling wine and 60ml of Aperol.
Top with a splash of soda water.
Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Squashed Frog
cocktails.description: Despite its name, this layered shot is very mild and sweet.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 15ml of grenadine into a shooter glass.
Carefully add 15ml of melon liqueur and 15ml of egg liqueur on top using a bar spoon.

cocktails.name: Stay Sober
cocktails.description: A delightful, refreshing non-alcoholic cocktail. The ratio of ingredients can be varied according to your taste.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice cubes.
Pour 30ml of apple juice and 30ml of cranberry juice.
Top with ginger beer.

cocktails.name: Stinger
