cocktails.description: Brandy and crème de menthe served straight up.
cocktails.instructions:
Add cognac and white crème de menthe into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Strawberry Colada
cocktails.description: A variation of the Piña Colada with strawberries.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a blender or shaker with crushed ice.
Add 30ml of rum, 20ml of strawberry liqueur and 50g of strawberries or strawberry puree.
Add 30ml of coconut cream and 90ml of pineapple juice.
Shake or blend until smooth and pour into a chilled goblet.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry.
Optionally, top with whipped cream.

cocktails.name: Strawberry Daiquiri Punch
cocktails.description: A popular variation of the Daiquiri cocktail. The recipe here is for 3–4 drinks.
cocktails.instructions:
Put some ice into a blender.
Add 120g of strawberries with 50g of sugar.
Pour 100ml of lemon juice and 25ml of lime juice.
Finally, add 180ml of light rum, and blend until smooth.
Pour into a chilled glass, and garnish with a strawberry.

cocktails.name: Strawberry Margarita
cocktails.description: A variation of the classic Margarita. The recipe here is for 3–4 drinks.
cocktails.instructions:
Put some ice and 120g of strawberries into a blender.
Add 180ml of tequila, 120ml of Cointreau or triple sec and 90ml of lime juice.
Blend until smooth, and pour into margarita glasses.
Garnish with a strawberry.

cocktails.name: Suburban
cocktails.description: A bit similar to the classic "Old Fashioned" because of the whiskey and bitters, this cocktail combines bourbon, rum and port.
cocktails.instructions:
Combine 50ml of bourbon, 25ml of aged dark rum and 25ml of aged tawny port wine in a mixing glass with ice.
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters and 1 dash of orange bitters.
Stir well and strain into a rocks glass with ice.
Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Suffering Bastard
cocktails.description: Brandy and gin highball lengthened with ginger beer.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, brandy, lime juice, and bitters into a shaker with ice.
Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice.
Top with ginger beer.
Garnish with a mint sprig and an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Swimming Pool
cocktails.description: A tropical cocktail with vodka, rum, coconut and pineapple flavors.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice.
Pour 30ml of vodka and 60ml of white rum.
Add 15ml of cream, 30ml of coconut milk and 60ml of pineapple juice.
Shake well and strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice.
Pour 15ml of blue curacao on the top.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

cocktails.name: Symphony
cocktails.description: A custom mix of gin, maraschino liqueur, green Chartreuse and a smoky Laphroaig float.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a mixing glass with ice.
Pour 30ml of gin, 20ml of maraschino liqueur, 20ml of green Chartreuse and 20ml of lemon juice.
Stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Float 5ml of Laphroaig on top.

cocktails.name: Szarlotka
cocktails.description: A simple Polish cocktail pairing Żubrówka with apple juice and cinnamon.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Pour 60ml of Żubrówka and 120ml of apple juice.
Add a pinch of grated cinnamon and stir gently.
Garnish with a cinnamon stick and an apple slice.

cocktails.name: Tarzan
cocktails.description: A refreshing long drink of gin, Campari and pineapple juice topped with soda.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a collins glass with ice.
Pour 30ml of gin and 30ml of Campari.
Add 45ml of pineapple juice, 15ml of sugar syrup and 15ml of lemon juice.
Top with soda water and stir gently.

cocktails.name: Tequila Rickey
cocktails.description: This classic cocktail is considered the best of the 'Rickey' group of drinks, which are made from a base spirit, lime juice and soda.
cocktails.instructions:
Put some ice into a highball glass.
Add 50ml of tequila and 30ml of lime juice. Top with soda.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Tequila Slammer
cocktails.description: Also called "Tequila Boom," this cocktail is great for a noisy party.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 50ml of tequila into a rocks glass.
Add 50ml of 7-Up or another carbonated beverage.
Cover the glass and quickly slam it onto a hard surface to release bubbles, then drink immediately.

cocktails.name: Tequila Sunrise
cocktails.description: Tequila and orange highball layered with grenadine.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add tequila and orange juice and stir.
Slowly pour grenadine to create a sunrise effect.
Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

cocktails.name: That's my word
cocktails.description: A floral riff on the Last Word with gin, St. Germain and yellow Chartreuse.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add gin, St. Germain, yellow Chartreuse and half a lime.
Shake and strain into a chilled coupe.

cocktails.name: Three Dots and a Dash
cocktails.description: Tiki mix of rum, spice, citrus, and honey, garnished with cherries.
cocktails.instructions:
Add aged rum, lime juice, orange juice, honey syrup, falernum, allspice dram, and bitters into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a tiki glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish with three maraschino cherries.

cocktails.name: Tipperary
cocktails.description: Irish whiskey stirred with green Chartreuse and sweet vermouth.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Toasted Almond
cocktails.description: A variation of this cocktail with vodka is called the "Roasted Toasted Almond".
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add amaretto, coffee liqueur and cream.
Shake and strain into a rocks glass.

cocktails.name: Tom and Jerry
cocktails.description: A classic winter cocktail that is very popular during Christmas time.
cocktails.instructions:
Separate the egg white from the yolk and beat them separately.
Pour the egg white on top of the yolk in an Irish coffee glass.
Carefully add sugar syrup, dark rum and cognac.
Fill with hot milk and garnish with grated nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Tom Collins
cocktails.instructions:
Add Old Tom gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup into a collins glass filled with ice.
Top with soda water and stir gently.
Garnish with a lemon slice and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Tommy's Margarita
cocktails.description: A simplified margarita using agave syrup instead of orange liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
Add tequila, lime juice, and agave syrup into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Tootsie Roll
cocktails.description: This nice and mild shot is an attempt to recall the famous "Tootsie Roll" candy. The recipe here is for 3–4 shots.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Pour coffee liqueur and orange juice.
Add vodka if you want to make it stronger.
Shake well and strain into a shooter.

cocktails.name: Trinidad Sour
cocktails.description: Bitters-heavy sour with rye and orgeat for balance.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Tropic Dream
cocktails.description: A delicious non-alcoholic summer beverage.
cocktails.instructions:
Put some ice, a banana and several strawberries into a blender.
Add pineapple juice and coconut syrup.
Blend until smooth, and pour into a hurricane glass.
Top with whipped cream, and garnish with a strawberry.

cocktails.name: Tuxedo
cocktails.description: Dry gin martini variant with maraschino and absinthe.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a cherry and a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Vampiro
cocktails.description: An IBA official cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add tequila blanco, tomato juice, orange juice and half a lime.
Add honey, onion, and slices of red chili pepper.
Add a few drops of Worcestershire sauce and a pinch of salt.
Shake well and strain into a highball glass.
Garnish with a lime wedge and a chili pepper.

cocktails.name: Ve.n.to
cocktails.description: Grappa sour sweetened with honey and chamomile cordial.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lemon twist and grapes.

cocktails.name: Vegas Bomb
cocktails.description: A sweet and energetic bomb shot combining whisky, peach schnapps and Red Bull.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour half a can of Red Bull into a pub glass.
Make a shot of rye whisky and peach schnapps, and drop it into the glass with the Red Bull.
Drink quickly.

cocktails.name: Vesper
cocktails.description: James Bond's martini with gin, vodka, and Lillet Blanc.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, vodka, and Lillet Blanc into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Vieux Carre
cocktails.description: New Orleans classic combining rye, cognac, vermouth, and Benedictine.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Virgin Colada
cocktails.description: A non-alcoholic variation of the "Piña Colada".
cocktails.instructions:
Put some crushed ice into a blender.
Add coconut milk and pineapple juice.
Blend until smooth, and pour into a hurricane glass.
Top with whipped cream, and garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Virgin Mary
cocktails.description: A non-alcoholic version of the "Bloody Mary" cocktail. It is also called the "Bloody Shame", "Bloody Virgin" or "Bloody Barbara".
cocktails.instructions:
Put ice cubes into a highball glass.
Add Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco, salt and black pepper.
Pour tomato juice and the juice of a quarter lemon.
Stir gently and garnish with a celery stalk or lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Vodka Rickey
cocktails.description: This classic cocktail is considered the best of the 'Rickey' group of drinks, which are made from a base spirit, lime juice and soda.
cocktails.instructions:
Put some ice into a highball glass.
Add 50ml of vodka and 30ml of lime juice. Top with soda.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Ward 8
cocktails.description: A classic whiskey cocktail with citrus and a touch of grenadine.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 60ml of rye whiskey, 15ml of lemon juice, 15ml of orange juice and a dash of grenadine.
Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.
Garnish with a cherry.

cocktails.name: Washington Apple
cocktails.description: A crisp mix of rye whiskey, apple liqueur and cranberry juice.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice cubes.
Add 60ml of rye whiskey and 60ml of apple liqueur.
Add about 60ml of cranberry juice to the top.

cocktails.name: Water Moccasin
cocktails.description: Named after the venomous snake, this shooter blends peach schnapps with rye whiskey and citrus.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 30ml of peach schnapps, 30ml of rye whiskey, 15ml of lemon juice and 15ml of simple syrup.
Pour a dash of triple sec or another orange liqueur.
Shake well and strain into shot glasses.

cocktails.name: Weng Weng
cocktails.description: A potent Filipino party drink combining six spirits with juices and grenadine.
cocktails.instructions:
Put some ice into a collins glass.
Pour 20ml of vodka, 20ml of tequila, 20ml of brandy, 20ml of bourbon, 20ml of Scotch whiskey and 20ml of orange juice.
Fill with equal parts orange juice and pineapple juice to the top.
Add a dash of grenadine.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Rebellion
cocktails.description: Whiskey and Pimm's combine with citrus and syrup for a refreshing twist.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour 30ml of Pimm's No. 1 and 30ml of rye whiskey into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add 15ml of lemon juice and 15ml of simple syrup.
Shake well and strain into a rocks glass over ice cubes.
Garnish with a lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.description: Classic bourbon sour optionally enriched with egg white.
cocktails.instructions:
Add bourbon, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white into a shaker without ice.
Dry shake.
Add ice and shake again.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: White Lady
cocktails.description: Gin sour sweetened with triple sec and balanced with lemon.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: White Negroni
cocktails.description: The White Negroni is a variation on the classic cocktail made with gin, Suze and Lillet Blanc.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Add 30ml of gin, 30ml of Suze and 30ml of Lillet Blanc and stir.
Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Woo Woo
cocktails.description: A popular party long drink of vodka, peach schnapps and cranberry juice.
cocktails.instructions:
Put ice cubes into a highball glass.
Pour 60ml of vodka, 30ml of peach schnapps and 120ml of cranberry juice.
Stir well and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Writer's Coffee
cocktails.description: A rich coffee cocktail with dark rum, Kahlua and maraschino liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill an irish coffee glass with ice cubes.
Add 60ml of dark rum, 45ml of Kahlua, 15ml of maraschino liqueur, 5ml of caramel syrup and 2 dashes of orange bitters.
Stir well and garnish with an orange wedge and an ice cube.

cocktails.name: Yellow Bird
cocktails.description: An IBA official all-day cocktail combining white rum, Galliano, triple sec and lime.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add 30ml of white rum, 15ml of Galliano, 15ml of triple sec and half a lime.
Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Zombie
cocktails.description: Potent tiki classic blending multiple rums, citrus, and spice.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients except the overproof rum into a blender with ice and blend briefly.
Pour into a tall glass.
Float the overproof rum on top.
Garnish with a mint sprig and a cherry.
